definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]

sentences.english: The astronaut was welcomed with joyous,resounding acclaim.
sentences.chinese: 人们欢声雷动地迎接那位宇航员。

sentences.english: The restaurant is full of chatter and laughter, and there is a general sense of wellbeing.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅里充满欢声笑语，总的给人一种富庶的感觉。

sentences.english: But spending more time with family, sprinkle with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 可多陪陪家人，洒下欢声笑语。

sentences.english: There were loud cheers AS the Irish team took the field.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰队一入场，全场立刻欢声雷动。

sentences.english: Some moments in our lives are wonderful, filled with joy and laughter.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中的一些时刻很精彩，充满了欢声笑语。

sentences.english: Hot noisy make of kick a shuttlecock game in the one the joys the voice the joke be over.
sentences.chinese: 热热闹闹的踢毽子比赛在一片欢声笑语中结束了。

sentences.english: The mountain village rang with cheers and laughter.
The whole theatre rocked  with deafening cheers.
The bell died in thepatter of rain, from hell came the laughing of Satan at my brain.
sentences.chinese: 然钟声忽止于急雨兮，但闻撒旦之欢声笑语。

sentences.english: Bringing happiness to me and taking the sadness away.
sentences.chinese: 带来欢声笑语，驱走悲愁忧伤。

sentences.english: Everywhere, filled with laughter festal atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 到处欢声笑语，充满了节日气氛。

sentences.english: But light, cheer, air, and comfortable proportions are everyplace.
sentences.chinese: 但是光线，欢声，气流随处都是，比例和谐舒服。

sentences.english: As the party went on,you could hear the mirth coming from the house.
sentences.chinese: 聚会进行时，你能听到屋里传出来的欢声笑语。

sentences.english: After lots of catching up and laughing, I'll go off for some time on my own to read and write in my notebook.
sentences.chinese: 欢声笑语之后，是留给我自己阅读写作的时间。

sentences.english: They tap at the window, and laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他们敲打窗户，欢声笑语。

sentences.english: There is more laughter and more song in America than anywhereelse.
sentences.chinese: 美国比其他任何地方都有更多的欢声笑语。

definition: smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
lit. a boiling cauldron of voices (idiom)/hubbub/brouhaha
variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
